validators.name: CountRowsValidator
validators.description: Number of rows is larger than 0

validators.name: NoNullsValidator
validators.description: No Null/Missing values in data for column ${column}

validators.name: NoZerosValidator
validators.description: No Zeros in columns for column ${column}

validators.name: NoNumericValuesTextualValidator
validators.description: No numeric values located on textual columns for column ${column}

validators.name: NoNumericValuesSmaller0Validator
validators.description: No Numeric values are smaller than 0 for column ${column}

validators.name: NoColumnsWithConstantValuesValidator
validators.description: No Columns with constant values for column ${column}

validators.name: NoDuplicatesInRowsValidator
validators.description: No Duplicate rows in all columns

validators.name: NoDuplicatesInSpecificColumnValidator
validators.description: No Duplicate rows in specific column ${column}
